仱字的基本解释

仱
qián
中国少数民族的一种乐曲。

仱字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qín］
［《集韻》渠金切，平侵，羣。］
相传为古代少数民族乐名。或作“禁”、“僸”。《後汉书·班固传下》：“四夷閒奏，德廣所及，仱佅兜離，罔不具集。”李贤注：“鄭玄注《周禮》云：'四夷之樂，東方曰韎，南方曰任，西方曰株離。北方曰禁。'禁，《字書》作'仱'，音渠禁反。”《文选·班固〈东都赋〉》“仱”作“僸”。一说“禁”为西夷之乐。见《公羊传·昭公二十五年》“以舞大夏”何休注。

仱字的康熙字典解释

【子集中】【人字部】　仱； 康熙笔画：6； 页码：页94第09
【集韻】其淹切，音箝。仱侏，樂人。　又居陵切，音兢。大也，愼也。

仱字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
仱字的起名意思

中国少数民族的一种乐曲。

Yi
Basic explanation of words
Yi
qián
A kind of music of Chinese ethnic minorities.
Yi
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qín］
["Jiyun" Qu Jinqie, flat invasion, group. ]
According to legend, it is an ancient ethnic minority music name. Or as "ban" or "僸". "The Book of the Later Han Dynasty·Ban Gu Chuan 2": "The four barbarians play freely, where the Germans and the Guangxi, you are all away from each other, and there is no collection." Li Xian's note: "Zheng Xuan's commentary "Zhou Li" says:'The joy of the four barbs, The east is called 韎, the south is called Ren, the west is called "Zhu Li". The north is called ban. "Forbidden, "Zi Shu" is "Qi", Yinqu is forbidden." "Wen Xuan · Ban Gu "East Capital Fu"" "Qi" is "僸". One said that "ban" is the joy of Xiyi. See "The Twenty-five Years of Gongyang Zhuan·Zhaogong" "Yiwu Daxia" He Xiu's note.
Yi
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset] [Human Character Department] 　仱; Kangxi Strokes: 6; Page Number: Page 94 Page 09
[Ji Yun] its drowning cut, tone clamp. Quiet, happy.　I live in the mausoleum again, sound trembling. Da Ye, Shu Ye.
Yi
